subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The United States players arrived with a strut that turned into a stagger after a determined Costa Rica team humbled them, 3-1, in a crucial World Cup qualifying match.
snippet: The United States players arrived with a strut that turned into a stagger after a determined Costa Rica team humbled them, 3-1, in a crucial World Cup qualifying match.
